description: This delicious fruit sweetened loaf is a healthy dessert or afternoon snack.
keywords: Carrot cake,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Egg,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Carrot Cake Loaf with Pecans Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the dates in a small bowl of boiling water for 10 minutes to soften slightly. Drain and set aside. Pre-heat the oven to 175°C/155°C fan-forced and line a loaf tin with parchment paper.
Add the soaked dates, oil, applesauce, eggs and vanilla and blend for 1-2 minutes to form a smooth batter. Add the grated carrots and pulse to combine.
Whisk the flour, baking powder and soda, cinnamon and mixed spice together in a large bowl. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry and mix well. Stir in the pecans.
Pour the batter into the loaf tin and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a skewer comes out clean. Remove from the oven and leave to cool for at least 10 minutes on a wire rack before serving.
